result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J Gerschwiler was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500), a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Costs to be paid as a condition of probation.   Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

AODA assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended. Comply with random urine screens. No use or possession of illegal drugs or drug paraphernalia.  No use or possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription. Any valid prescriptions drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are prescribed/sign releases.

Maintain full time employment and/or combination of schooling.  Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent.  No contact with victim business listed in the criminal complaint.
If probation is revoked and a prison term is not ordered, or if probation is discharged/terminated, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant and in favor of restitution victims and government entities for outstanding financial obligations.  Collection may include income assignment.

timeConds.notes: Huber, non working hours with standard release conditions - LAST 30 DAYS STAYED - to commence 05-17-2016 by 5:00 pm.

records.addlTxt:
ADDRESS INFO for Michael J Gerschwiler
Current: 6010 S. Kingan Avenue  Unit 6, Cudahy, WI 53110 United States  (Effective: 05-03-2016)
Prior: 10135 W. Forest Home Ave #201, Hales Corners, WI 53130
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

Defendant Michael J Gerschwiler in court with Attorney James E Goldmann.  Melissa Zilavy appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Case called for plea and sentencing.  State files an amended information.  Defendant enters a guilty plea to Count #1 on amended information.  Court performs plea colloquy and finds Defendant guilty of Count #1 on amended information.  State gives sentencing recommendations.  Attorney Goldmann makes statements regarding sentencing.  Defendant makes statements.  Court sentences the  Defendant to the following:

COUNT #1:  IMPOSED AND STAYED SENTENCE OF:   

20 DAYS HUBER 

TERM OF PROBATION:  1 YEAR   *Transfer allowed to Milwaukee County*

CONDITIONS OF PROBATON:  
____AODA Assessment and follow through with any treatment recommended;
____Random U.A.'s ; 
____No Use or Possession of illegal drugs/drug paraphernalia 
____No Use or Possession of prescription drugs without a valid prescription;
____Any valid prescription drugs must be taken only in the manner in which they are 
prescribed/sign releases.
____Follow through with any treatment and/or counseling recommended by Agent;
____Maintain employment and/or combination of schooling 
____No contact with: victim business listed in criminal complaint

COSTS:  $253.00 & $200.00 DNA surcharge (to be paid as a condition of probation)

** Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided,   immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.**


CONDITION TIME:   40 Days - LAST 30 DAYS STAYED, Non-working hours with standard release conditions - to commence 5/17/16 by 5:00 p.m.
